alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 5:36AM MST until February 28 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including over Teton and Togwotee Passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
